qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: This questionnaire has 50 statements. Please answer them all. After each statement there are three boxes. Check the first box if you generally AGREE with the statement. Check the middle box if you are UNDECIDED, or if the statement has no relevance to your software or to your situation. Check the right box if you generally DISAGREE with the statement. In checking the left or right box you are not necessarily indicating strong agreement or disagreement but just your general feeling most of the time. There are also five general questions at the end.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} responds too slowly to inputs.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I would recommend ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} to my colleagues.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The instructions and prompts are helpful.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has at some time stopped unexpectedly.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Learning to operate ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} initially is full of problems.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I sometimes don't know what to do next with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I enjoy the time I spend using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I find that the help information given by ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is not very useful.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: If ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} stops it is not easy to restart it.

qu:Page.name: Statements 1-10 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It takes too long to learn the ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} functions.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I sometimes wonder if I am using the right function.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Working with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is satisfying.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The way that system information is presented is clear and understandable.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I feel safer if I use only a few familiar functions.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} documentation is very informative.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} seems to disrupt the way I normally like to arrange my work.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Working with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is mentally stimulating.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: There is never enough information on the screen when it's needed.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I feel in command of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} when I am using it.

qu:Page.name: Statements 11-20 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I prefer to stick to the functions that I know best.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I think ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is inconsistent.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I would not like to use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} every day.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I can understand and act on the information provided by ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is awkward when I want to do something which is not standard.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: There is too much to read before you can use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Tasks can be performed in a straight forward manner using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is frustrating.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} has helped me overcome any problems I have had in using it.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The speed of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is fast enough.

qu:Page.name: Statements 21-30 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I keep having to go back to look at the guides.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It is obvious that user needs have been fully taken into consideration.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: There have been times in using ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} when I have felt quite tense.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The organisation of the menus seems quite logical.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} allows the user to be economic of keystrokes.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Learning how to use new functions is difficult.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: There are too many steps required to get something to work.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I think this software has sometimes given me a headache.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Error messages are not adequate.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It is easy to make ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} do exactly what you want.

qu:Page.name: Statements 31-40 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I will never learn to use all that is offered in ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} hasn't always done what I was expecting.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} presents itself in a very attractive way.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Either the amount or quality of the help information varies across ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It is relatively easy to move from one part of a task to another.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It is easy to forget how to do things with ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} occasionally behaves in a way which can't be understood.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is really very awkward.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: It is easy to see at a glance what the options are at each stage.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Getting data files in and out of ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is not easy.

qu:Page.name: Statements 41-50 of 50
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: I have to look for assistance most times when I use ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}.

qu:Page.name: Overall Success
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Altogether, ${SURVEY.RESOURCE} is a success.
